title: Google launches its competitor to Amazon's Alexa Fund to beef up its smart assistant
text: Google launches its competitor to Amazon's Alexa Fund to beef up its smart assistant Jillian D'Onfro Reblog Google is launching a new investing program to pour money and other resources into early-stage startups that work with its digital assistant. The program resembles Amazon's Alexa Fund and reflects the extent to which Google sees the success of its smart assistant as a driver of future growth. Google is launching a new program to pour money and other resources into early-stage start-ups that work with its digital assistant. Reblog What to Read Next
